title: Untitled (Greenheads)
description: two square images next to each other--comic-strip fashion; image at left has two figures with round green heads wearing black masks around their eyes and orange shirts with green vests; figure at left has two Band-Aids on its face and holds its PR hand on the stomach of reclining figure with a green face, open mouth and wide eyes wearing a white leotard; image at right has same figures with reclining figure\'s mouth open wider and two standing figures appear to be talking
creditline: Gift of Robert Goff and Matthew McAlpin
